content: parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 4 colour d in this round you will be working in the backstrands of the fpsc on the back of your work and also in the ch2-spaces on the front of your work start around any ch2-space *5 double_crochet around the chain-space ch3 1 single_crochet in the strands of the back of the fpsc from the prev round ch3* x 8 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 40 double_crochet 16 ch3 8 single_crochet round 5 colour e in this round you will be working in stitches from both round 3 and 4 start around any fpsc from round 3 *1 fpsc around the fpsc from round 3 1 single_crochet around the ch3 skip the first double_crochet and work 2 half_double_crochet in the gap between the dcs x 4 times 1 single_crochet around the ch3-space* x 8 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 8 fpsc 16 single_crochet 64hdc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 6 colour f start around any first half_double_crochet of any petal *1 bp single_crochet 1 bphdc around the next 2 sts 1 bpdc around the next in the space between the hdcs make 1 double_crochet 1 picot3b 1 double_crochet 1 bpdc around the next 1 bphdc around the next 2 1 bpsc ch1 skip 3 sts which are the single_crochet fpsc and single_crochet* x 8 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 16 double_crochet 8 picots 16 bpdc 24 bphdc 16 bpsc round 7 colour b in this round you will only be working around the ch1 from the previous round skip all other stitches start around any ch1 space * 1 dc3bobble ch2 1 dc3bobble ch4* x 8 times cut your yarn and fasten_off stitch count 16 dc3bobble 8 ch2 8 ch4 © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not
